Resample.h

00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   Dominic Mazzoni
00006 
00007   This class abstracts the interface to two different resampling
00008   libraries:
00009 
00010     libresample, written by Dominic Mazzoni based on Resample-1.7
00011     by Julius Smith.  LGPL.
00012 
00013     libsamplerate, written by Erik de Castro Lopo.  GPL.  The author
00014     of libsamplerate requests that you not distribute a binary version
00015     of Audacity that links to libsamplerate and also has plug-in support.
00016 
00017   Since Audacity always does resampling on mono streams that are
00018   contiguous in memory, this class doesn't support multiple channels
00019   or some of the other optional features of some of these resamplers.
00020 
00021 **********************************************************************/
00022
